DocumentFullscreenchange_event.summary: The fullscreenchange event is fired immediately after the browser switches into or out of fullscreen mode.

remarks.para: The event is sent to the Element that is transitioning into or out of fullscreen mode, and this event then bubbles up to the Document.

To find out whether the Element is entering or exiting fullscreen mode, check the value of : if this value is null then the element is exiting fullscreen mode, otherwise it is entering fullscreen mode.
